metadata.title: CVE-2017-15021 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: bfd_get_debug_link_info_1 in opncls.c in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD)library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29, allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read andapplication crash) via a crafted ELF file, related to bfd_getl32.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
